DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study carry randomize double blind control trial 30 male subject investigate effect acai consumption acute change vascular function , cardiovascular marker . As secondary aim study allow u characterize absorption metabolism acai polyphenols humans 24 hour period .
DOC.brief_title: Cardiovascular Benefits Acai Polyphenols Volunteers Risk Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Male , 3065 age , BMI 2535 kg/m2 , Cholesterol < 8 mmol/l . Female , BMI < 25 > 35 kg/m2 , Cholesterol > 8mmol l1 , elevate fast blood sugar > 6.5 mmols l1 , elevate systolic blood pressure > 150 mmHg , history stroke heart attack within previous 12 month , current smoking , take lipid lowering , blood pressure lower antiblood clot medication take micronutrient supplement .
